text: Recent view of the palace. Dar Ibn Abi Dhiaf is a palace in the medina of Tunis, located near the Pasha Street and Sidi Mahrez Mosque, in the Ibn Abi Diaf dead end. == history == Metallic plaque indicating the Ibn Abi Diaf dead end. The palace was built by the minister Ahmad ibn Abi Diyaf in the 19th century. == Architecture == Porte à Beb souika.JPG|Palace gate DetaDessu.JPG|Detail of the palace gate Impasse Ben Abi Dhiaf زنقة ابن أبي ضياف.jpg|View of the palace == References == Ibn Abi Dhiaf
title: Dar Ibn Abi Dhiaf
